mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_room_member crm1 ON cr.chat_room_seq = crm1.chat_room_seq JOIN chat_room_member crm2 ON cr.chat_room_seq = crm2.chat_room_seq WHERE crm1.emp_no = #{emp_no1} AND crm2.emp_no = #{emp_no2} AND cr.room_type = '1:1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (chat_room_seq, room_type, created_date) VALUES (chat_room_seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomType}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO chat_room (chat_room_seq, room_type, created_date) VALUES (chat_room_seq.NEXTVAL, 'GROUP', SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO chat_room_member (chat_room_seq, emp_no, chat_room_name) VALUES (#{chatRoomSeq}, #{empNo}, #{chatRoomName})
mapper.select: SELECT crm.CHAT_ROOM_SEQ, crm.CHAT_ROOM_NAME, COUNT(c.chat_seq) AS unread_count FROM chat_room_member crm LEFT JOIN chat c ON crm.CHAT_ROOM_SEQ = c.chat_room_seq AND c.read_count = 1 AND c.name != crm.emp_no WHERE crm.emp_no = #{empNo} GROUP BY crm.CHAT_ROOM_SEQ, crm.CHAT_ROOM_NAME
SELECT room_type FROM chat_room WHERE chat_room_seq = #{chatRoomSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat_room_member WHERE chat_room_seq = #{chatRoomSeq} AND emp_no = #{empNo}
